fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, you may choose a player to shoot. You will also shoot all adjacent players (players one house away). (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If the player number is 1 or the largest number, the shot will wrap to the other end of the list.
- If any of your targets are town, you will die the following night from guilt.
